@bryngoodman @MichaelT1979 @ARNewcombe @FarrowMr it's tricky, it comes down to expectations with accountability.

@MichaelT1979 @bryngoodman @ARNewcombe @FarrowMr in some situations it would mean all staff are middle leaders - then do we need the title?
@ARNewcombe @MichaelT1979 @bryngoodman @FarrowMr every school needs to be clear on leadership structure. It's possible to have too many..
@MichaelT1979 @FarrowMr HT and Gov's need to be very clear about the job description and leadership structure.
@MichaelT1979 @FarrowMr this can vary greatly from school to school. Some would call coordinators Middle Leaders.
